programme.title: Men's 10km | Marathon Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Men's 10km Marathon Swimming took place at Pont Alexandre III, France, on 09/08/2024. Kristof Rasovszky (HUN) won the Gold, with a time of 1:50:52.7 hour. Oliver Klemet (GER) won the Silver, and David Betlehem (HUN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Teenage duo Suratwadi & Wiberg have Olympic and Paralympic Games in focus
programme.desc: Hard work and a willingness to learn keep weightlifter Phonnapha Suratwadi and wheelchair racer Ty Wiberg on course for the Games.

programme.title: Mixed Dinghy Medal Race - MX Multihull Medal Race - Men's & Women's Kitesurfing SFs A & B, Finals Heats 1, 2 | Sailing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session took place at Marseille Marina - Corniche, and Marseille Marina - Frioul, on 07/08/24.
In Mixed Dinghy, Vadlau/Maehr (AUT) won Gold, Okada/Yoshioka (JPN) won Silver and Dahlberg/Karlsson (SWE) won Bronze.
In Mixed Multihull, Tita/Banti (ITA) won Gold, Majdalani/Bosco (ARG) won Silver and Wilkinson/Dawson (NZL) won Bronze.
In Women's Kite, Eleanor Aldridge (GBR) won Gold, Laudriane Nolot (FRA) won Silver and Annelous Lammerts (NED) won Bronze.

programme.title: London legacy lives on with the help of Jessica Ennis-Hill and Etienne Stott
programme.desc: Four years on, we conquer canoe's Legacy Loop and meet a teenager emulating Jessica Ennis-Hill and an Olympic baby named after her.

programme.title: Archery’s “Fan of the Year” Finds His Path Through Autism with the Sport
programme.desc: Andrew Hornsby is the sport’s biggest fan and is surprised with a trip across the globe to attend the Indoor World Finals

programme.title: Teams Technical Routine | Artistic Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Teams Technical Routine took place at Aquatics Centre, Paris, on 05/08/24.

programme.title: Teams Free Routine | Artistic Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Teams Free Routine took place at Aquatics Centre, Paris, on 06/08/24.

programme.title: Ale: the Mexican diver trying to keep it all in synch | The Starting Line
programme.desc: Alejandra Orozco, two-time Olympic medallist in diving for Mexico, makes her fourth return to the Olympics at Paris 2024. More in sync than ever with her diving partner, Gabriela Agundez, and her family, she takes us back to where it all began: the family farm in the outskirt of Guadaljara. With the support of a loving family, hard work and dedication, she is hoping to reach the pinnacle of her career with Gold this Summer surrounded by her loved ones.

programme.title: Women's 3m Springboard Final | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Women's 3m Springboard Final took place at the Aquatics Centre on 09/08/24.
Chen Yiwen (CHN) won Gold, Keeney Maddison (AUS) won Silver and Chang Yani (CHN) took the Bronze medal.

programme.title: Tom Daley: 1.6 Seconds | Documentary
programme.desc: This feature documentary dives into the life of the UK’s diving legend. From Beijing 2008 to his gold medal in Tokyo 2020 and final Olympics in Paris 2024, Daley shares his personal journey, the pressures, losses, and triumphs that defined his career. Exclusive footage and candid moments reveal a story of resilience and growth.

programme.title: Men's 400m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 400m Freestyle Race was held on 27/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Lukas Maertens (GER) claimed Gold with a time of 3:41.78, Elijah Winnington (AUS) took Silver and Kim Woomin (KOR) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 400m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 400m Freestyle Race was held on 27/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Ariarne Titmus (AUS) claimed Gold with a time of 3:57.49. Summer McIntosh (CAN) took Silver and Katie Ledecky (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 4x100m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's's 4x100m Freestyle relay Final was held on 27/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Australia claimed Gold with a time of 3:28.92, The United States of America took Silver and China completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 4x100m Freestyle Relay - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 4x100m Freestyle Relay Final was held on 27/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. The United States of America claimed Gold with a time of 3:09.28, Australia took Silver and Italy completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 100m Butterfly - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 100m Butterfly Race was held on 28/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Torri Huske (USA) claimed Gold with a time of 55.59sec, Gretchen Walsh (USA) took Sillver and Zhang Yufei (CHN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 100m Breaststroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 100m Breaststroke Race was held on 28/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Nicolo Martinenghi (ITA) claimed Gold wiht a time of 59.03sec, Adam Peaty (GBR) and Nic Fink (USA) claimed Silver in a dead heat to complete the podium.

programme.title: Men's 4x200m Freestyle Relay - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 4x200m Freestyle was held on 30/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Great Britain claimed the Gold with a time of 6:59.43, The United States of America took Silver and Australia completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 100m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 100m Freestyle was held on 31/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Sarah Sjoestroem (SWE) claimed Gold with a time of 52.16 seconds, Torri Huske (USA) took Silver, and Siobhan Bernadette Haughey (HKG) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 200m Butterfly - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 200m Butterfly was held on 31/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Leon Marchand (FRA) claimed Gold with a new Olympic Record time of 1:51:21, Kristof Milak (HUN) took Silver and Ilya Kharun (CAN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 1500m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 1500m Freestyle was held on 31/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Katie LeDecky (USA) claimed Gold with an Olympic record time of 15:30.02 seconds, Anastasiia Kirpichnikova (FRA) took Silver, and Isabel Gose (GER) completed the podium.

programme.title: Michael Andrew, Team USA’s Record-Breaking Machine | Splash In
programme.desc: He was a teenager when he started breaking US national age group records. Over the course of his career, he broke more than 100 national records. At Tokyo 2020, he helped team USA break the world record in the 4 x 100 medley relay and won his first Olympic Gold. Soundtrack: Glass Animals, Heat Waves

programme.title: Molly Carlson, Canada’s Brave High Diver | Splash In
programme.desc: She started as a gymnast, then switched to diving, before specializing in high diving (20m) because that is what bravery is to her. Along the journey, she learned how to deal with mental health struggles, an experience that she now shares with her fans as a mental health advocate and founder of the #bravegang. Soundtrack: Bastille, Shut Off The Lights

programme.title: Melissa Wu, the Australian Olympic Diver Who Does Not Give Up | Splash In
programme.desc: At the age of 10 she knew that diving was the sport for her. Throughout her 16 years career, diving helped her overcome depression, anxiety, and lack of self-belief, until she won bronze in Tokyo 2020. Watch her story. Soundtrack: Bree Runway, Pressure.

programme.title: ESP-NED - Women's Semi-Final | Water Polo | Olympics Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Women's Semi-Final match between Spain v Netherlands took place at Paris La Defense Arena, Paris, on 08/08/24. Spain won with a final score ESP 14(5):(4)14 NED.

programme.title: HUN - CRO - Men's Semi-Final | Water Polo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Men's Semi-Final match between Hungary v Croatia took place at Paris La Defense Arena, Paris, on 09/08/24. Final score CRO 9:8 HUN.

programme.title: USA-HUN - Men's Bronze Medal Match | Water Polo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Bronze Medal Match was played on 11/08/2024 at the La Defense Arena, The United States of America claimed Bronze with a 11:8 victory over Hungary.

programme.title: ESP-AUS - Women's Gold Medal Match | Water Polo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Gold Medal Match took place at Paris La Defense Arena, Paris, on 10/08/2024. Spain won Gold with a final score ESP 11:9 AUS.

programme.desc: The Women's 4x200m Freestyle Relay was held on 01/08/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Australia claimed Gold with an Olympic record time of 07:38.08, United States of America took Silver and China completed the podium.

programme.title: Personal Best: Paris 2024
programme.desc: Relive the Paris 2024 Olympic Games through the journeys of eight remarkable athletes who pushed past limits, defied expectations, and inspired the world. Featuring Noah Lyles, Faith Kipyegon, Jack Robinson, Huang Yaqiong and Zheng Siwei, Leon Marchand, Olga Kharlan and Cindy Ngamba.

programme.title: Aya: the first female swimmer to represent Gabon at the Olympics | Playing Fields
programme.desc: An Olympic swimmer overcomes her tragic past and is determined to keep swimming. We see the inspiring relationship she has with her father as they train for future competitions.
